channel.title: +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +मानसतरङ्गिणीकृल्-लेखाः on संस्कारे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: mAnasA in vanga
item.description: The vA~Nga cult of manasA has many unusual features not seen in the south. It is also rather unusual that she rose to be one of the most celebrated goddesses of the region. Some of those include: Her identification with an ancient goddess padmAvatI (shown with a snake in jina tradition. Her rivalry with the goddess chaNDikA who blinds one of her eyes. Her unusual companion netA the laundrywoman of the deva-s.
